court:

outcome: this is not a matter to be quashed
full_text:

IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM

THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE SUNIL THOMAS
WEDNESDAY, THE 1ST DAY OF JUNE 2016/11TH JYAISHTA, 1938
Crl.MC.No. 2874 of 2016 ()
sc NO.638/2015 OF ADDL. DISTRICT COURT, MANJERI
CRIME NO.168/2013 OF TIRUR POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM

PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED:

IBRAHIM,

AGED: 34 YEARS, s/o. MUHAMMED, PUTHUPARAMBIL HOUSE,

KAINIKKARA (PO), POILISSERY, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT

BY ADV. SRI.R.RANJITH (MANJERTI)
RESPONDENT (S) /STATE&DEFACTO COMPLAINANT:

1. THE STATE OF KERALA

REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR,

HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM,

KOCHI-682031-FOR

THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE,

CHANGARAMKULAMI POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT

2. SABIRA

w/o BEERANKUTTY, PARAMMEL HOUSE,

KAINIKKARA, POILISSERI, TIRUR TALUK,

MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-676 101

R2 BY ADV. SMT.M.LISHA

R1 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.M.T.SHEEBA

THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON

01-06-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Beas
2016/KER/23861
Cr1.MC.No. 2874 of 2016 ()
APPENDIX

PETITIONER (S) ' EXHIBITS
ANNEXURE A: COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT /CHARGE IN CRIME NO.168/13 OF
TTRUR POLICE STATION.
ANNEXURE B: COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT
DT. 16/4/16.
RESPONDENTS EXHIBITS: NIL

/TRUE coPy/

P.A. TO JUDGE
SKV

Dh
2016/KER/23861
SUNIL THOMAS, J.
Dated this the 1* day of June, 2016
ORDER

The matter was argued at length by both sides.

2. | Having regard to the nature of allegations, | feel that,
this is not a matter to be quashed in exercise of powers under
Section 482 Cr.P.C. In the above circumstances, both sides
submitted that, direction may be given to the court below to
expedite the proceedings to avoid agony of both sides. 3.
Having regard to this, | am inclined to direct the court below to
take up the Sessions Case No.638/2015 and to dispose it of, at
the earliest, having regard to the pendency of the cases and also
other matters which require priority.

Crl.M.C. stands closed with the above observation.

Sd/-
SUNIL THOMAS, JUDGE.
/true copy/
P, A. to Judge
Pn
